hero.headline: Never miss trash day again.
hero.body: Weekly curbside valet for trash & recycling with optional bin cleaning. Local, background-checked, and neighborly service.
hero.flag_text: Prosper & Celina • Collin County • Allen + nearby

bin_cleaning.why: Reduce odors, pests, and germs with high-temp wash & sanitize.
bin_cleaning.scheduling: We align to your trash day when possible.

commercial.headline: Property Trash Valet
commercial.subhead: Door-to-dumpster evening collection for apartments, condos, and retirement homes.
commercial.benefits: Cleaner property, happier residents, fewer overflows, improved NOI.

sla.container_specs: 13–15 gallon bags, tied; no loose trash

commercial.escalation: Issues are logged during route and escalated to property contact with photo/context; resolved on next service window or scheduled sweep.

faq.a: We set bins out the evening before pickup and return them after collection (Standard/Premium).
Let us know within 24 hours and we’ll make it right on the next available window.

faq.q: How do I schedule bin cleaning?
faq.a: Choose Standard (1x/mo) or Premium (2x/mo), or request a one-time cleaning via the contact form.

faq.q: Do you serve my property for community valet?
faq.a: Yes—apartments, condos, and retirement communities within ~40 minutes of Allen. Request a proposal.

faq.q: Commercial bag limits and acceptable items?
faq.a: 2 tied 13–15 gallon bags per unit; no loose trash, liquids, hazmat, or bulk items.
We track stops/volumes/issues and escalate with photos/context to your property contact for resolution.

seo.title_home: CurbEase – Valet Trash & Bin Cleaning (Prosper • Celina • Allen)
seo.desc_home: Weekly curbside bin valet and professional trash & recycle bin cleaning. Police-officer-owned, background-checked, and local.
seo.desc_services: Plans for every home plus optional bin cleaning and exterior soft-wash.
seo.desc_bin_cleaning: High-temp wash & sanitize for residential bins.
seo.desc_commercial: Door-to-dumpster evening collection with reporting and compliance.
